text: Global Force Wrestling LLC (GFW) was a professional wrestling company founded on April 7, 2014 by Jeff Jarrett. The television product for the promotion was produced by 25/7 Productions and Dave Broome, creator of NBC's The Biggest Loser. Global Force Wrestling has a working relationship with the Mexican Asistencia Asesoría y Administración (AAA) professional wrestling promotion. On June 21, 2014, GFW and New Japan Pro Wrestling both announced that they had a working relationship with each other. ==References== ==Other websites== *Official GFW website Category:2014 establishments Category:Sports in Nashville, Tennessee Category:American professional wrestling promotions Category:Companies based in Tennessee Category:2010s establishments in Tennessee Category:2018 disestablishments in the United States
title: Global Force Wrestling
